attributes.review: i downloaded this app a couple days ago just to be quirky and all 🙈✨🧚🏽 i didn’t really think much of it since it’s just an app. but one day i was REALLY bored and didn’t know what to do so i decided to use this app and see what’s going on with our lOvelY president 🥰 (it was 3:09 am btw). so i was on the app for about 10 minutes when weird things started happening. my phone started bugging and started playing the purge sound or whatever and after a couple seconds my phone died. i was starting to get really scared so i just restated my phone when i saw an orange looking dude figure at the corner of my eye. i got even more scared because it was dark and the orangeness of this dude was BLINDING!!!! i didn’t wanna look directly at him because i didn’t wanna go blind so i just decided to go to sleep and ignore it even though i was really scared to. the next day i was home alone minding my own business chilling in my room when i heard rustling noises. i didn’t want to check it out bc i’m not a white person in a movie so i just ignored it. couple minutes later i went to the bathroom and used the toilet. i was a kinda hungry so i decided to get me some snacks before going back to my room when i saw cheetos dust shaped like footprints on the kitchen floor. i was freaking out and didn’t know what to do so i ran to my room and covered myself with a blanket. then i started hearing footsteps. it didn’t sound like any of my siblings nor my parents footsteps so i started tearing up. the footsteps started getting louder and louder as it approached my room. i was shaking and didn’t wanna get out of bed. then the footsteps stopped. it was just silence. so i peeked through my blanket and the orange dude ran towards me and yelled “give the app 5 stars”. i quickly deleted the app after what happened and everything’s back to normal.
attributes.title: why this app is scary 😳
